name: Cheeseburger Chowder
author: boorandy
summary: This is a quick, hearty dish that the family is sure to love!
ingredients: 1 pound processed cheese food (such as Velveeta ®), cut into chunks
½ pound sharp Cheddar cheese, cut into chunks
directions: Heat a large pot or Dutch oven over medium-high heat
Cook and stir beef until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes; drain and discard grease
Add diced potatoes and onion; cook and stir until onion is tender, 5 to 10 minutes
Mix milk, processed cheese food, and Cheddar cheese into beef mixture; bring to a boil
Reduce heat and simmer, stirring often, until heated through and cheese is melted, 15 to 20 minutes; season with pepper
Add mashed potatoes for a thicker chowder; cook until heated through and thickened, about 5 minutes
